segments.text: I notice the water is just pouring out of the sink, and the woman is completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn’t seem to notice or care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and I’m amazed he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, and it’s surprising how patient she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more slippery, and I’m surprised the woman hasn’t slipped yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and I’m surprised the boy hasn’t been caught yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, and it’s surprising how calm everything seems from the outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be very surprised when she finally turns around and sees the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is still reaching for more cookies, and I’m surprised he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
